author: @AndreasMueller
text: Thanks for this awesome review! I'm glad you found the book helpful and that it came at a good time for you! It gives me some motivation to keep working on the next one (based on my lecture series), probably not starting with iris the next time ;)   Unfortunately O'Reilly only prints in color in very rare cases, which is a bit sad but makes sense, I'm still figuring out how to ensure my next one will be in color!  PS: All your points about scope and what to add/update etc were spot-on!
